## R Packages and Software

Here are some of the key software packages I have developed:

- **[netplot](https://github.com/USCCANA/netplot)**: Beautiful network plots using ggplot2
- **[ergmito](https://github.com/muriteams/ergmito)**: ERGMs for small networks
- **[slurmR](https://github.com/USCbiostats/slurmR)**: R and SLURM integration
- **[ABCoptim](https://github.com/gvegayon/ABCoptim)**: Artificial Bee Colony optimization
- **[netdiffuseR](https://github.com/USCCANA/netdiffuseR)**: Network diffusion analysis
- **[epiworldR](https://github.com/UofUEpiBio/epiworldR)**: Agent-based modeling for epidemiology
- **[rgexf](https://github.com/gvegayon/rgexf)**: R package for GEXF graph files

For a complete and up-to-date list, please visit my [GitHub profile](https://github.com/gvegayon) or the [software.bib file](https://github.com/gvegayon/resume/blob/master/software.bib) in my resume repository.
